page.syntax: Output_String as C = scripteditor_open(C scriptname [,C type [,C action_script_prompt [,L forceReloadOfOpenCleanScript ]]])

argument.name: type
argument.description:
Optional. Default = "Script"
"Script" = Opens the script specified by Script_Name.
"Function" = Opens the function specified by Script_Name.

page.discussion: SCRIPTEDITOR_OPEN() opens the named script in the Code Editor.
